South Korean Delegation and Visiting Group Here 
    Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A south side's delegation headed by Ryu Kyong Son, president of the south Korean Association of Northeast Asia Photo Cultural Exchange, to participate in the North-South joint photo exhibition for commemorating the 4th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and a visiting group of non-governmental organization "Let the Children in the South and the North Go Hand in Hand" led by General Director Kwon Kun Sul arrived here yesterday by air.

articles.content:
Greetings to Russian President 
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Russian President V. V. Putin on the national day of Russia.
 He in the message expressed the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia would continue to grow in scope and develop in various fields in the spirit of the agreement reached at several meetings and talks between him and President Putin.    
 He wholeheartedly wished the president greater success in his noble work and Russia security and prosperity and its people happiness.

Vice-Premier of DPRK Cabinet Meets Swiss Guests 
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet, met and had a friendly conversation with Peter Zuellig, chief executive of the Interpacific of  Switzerland, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
 On hand were Rim Kyong Man, minister of Foreign Trade, and officials concerned.

Russian Consul-General in Chongjin Hosts Reception
    Chongjin, June 11 (KCNA) -- Arkady Lavrov, Russian consul-general in Chongjin, hosted a reception Friday evening on the occasion of the national day of Russia.
 Present on invitation were Kim Song Gwon, vice-chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, and officials concerned.    
 Speeches were made there.

President of ITF and His Party Here
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- President of the International Taekwon-do Federation Jang Ung and his party arrived here today.
 He is accompanied by Senior Vice-president Ri Ki Ha and Vice-president Leong Wai-Meng.    
 They were greeted at the airport by Hwang Pong Yong, chairman of the DPRK Taekwon-do Committee, and Ryu Song Il, vice-chairman of the committee.

articles.title: Greetings to Russian Prime Minister
Greetings to Russian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Mikhail Yefimovich Fradkov, prime minister of the Russian Federation, on the occasion of the national day.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by the special relationship of top leaders would grow stronger on good terms on the basis of the DPRK-Russia joint declarations, the message expected bilateral economic cooperation to register a good result.

articles.title: Greetings to Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to his Russian counterpart Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov on the occasion of the national day of the Russian Federation.
 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms on the basis of the particular relationship between the top leaders of the two countries, the message sincerely wished the Russian foreign minister great success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Unit
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian President
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on the occasion of the national day of the country.
 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields in the interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished him greater success in his responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the country.
